page.title: 11Transport through the Area.
page.content: Brereton, due to it's position sitting astride the A50, has always been accustomed to {traffic.}In the days of Stage-coaches,the Bears Head was a handy stopping off point.Of course due to the close proximity of a{Motorway junction,the volume of traffic has increased tremendously over the last few years. We decided that we would conduct a Traffic Census on the roads in our area. . Cars. . Vans. . Lorries. . Buses. ________.________.____________._______ M6(N)174. 39 .. 123 . 1 M6(S)175 49 94 . 2 . Count taken for 10 mins(2.25pm) A50(N)62. 14 . 8 . 1 A50(S)65. 13 . 9 . 1 count taken for 30mins (10.30am) School 6. 2 . 3Tractors. 30mins Lane
